verses.verse: <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> because <S%H182>of<s%> the <S%H3571>Cushite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> whom he had <S%H3947>married;<s%> for he had <S%H3947>married<s%> a <S%H3571>Cushite<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
They <S%H559>said,<s%> "Has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> indeed <S%H559>spoken<s%> only with <S%H4872>Moses?<s%> <S%H1696>Hasn't<s%> he spoken also with <S%H3068>us?<s%>" And Yahweh heard <S%H8085>it.<s%>
Now the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6035>humble,<s%> above all the <S%H120>men<s%> who were on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> "You <S%H7969>three<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting!<s%>" The <S%H7969>three<s%> of them came <S%H3318>out.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam;<s%> and they <S%H8147>both<s%> came <S%H3318>forward.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> now my <S%H1697>words.<s%> If there is a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among <S%H3068>you,<s%> I Yahweh will make myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to him in a <S%H4759>vision.<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him in a <S%H2472>dream.<s%>
My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> is not <S%H539>so.<s%> He is faithful in all my <S%H1004>house.<s%>

With him I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> even <S%H4758>plainly,<s%> and not in <S%H2420>riddles;<s%> and he shall <S%H5027>see<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8544>form.<s%> Why then were you not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> against my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses?<s%>"
The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3212>them;<s%> and he departed.

The <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from over the <S%H168>Tent;<s%> and <S%H4813>behold,<s%> Miriam was <S%H6879>leprous,<s%> as white as <S%H7950>snow.<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> at <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> and <S%H6879>behold,<s%> she was leprous.

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> please <S%H7896>don't<s%> count this <S%H2403>sin<s%> against <S%H2973>us,<s%> in which we have done foolishly, and in which we have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

Let her <S%H4994>not,<s%> I pray, be as one dead, of whom the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> when he comes <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H7358>womb.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "If her <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H3417>but<s%> <S%H3417>spit<s%> in her <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3637>shouldn't<s%> she be ashamed <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days?<s%> Let her be <S%H5462>shut<s%> up <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that she shall be brought in <S%H622>again.<s%>"

<S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H5462>shut<s%> up <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>didn't<s%> travel until <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was brought in <S%H622>again.<s%>
<S%H310>Afterward<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>
